title: Ultimate Bravery Featured Gamemode Idea
body:
TL;DR: Would you like the idea of Ultimate Bravery as a featured gamemode?

So I was playing [Ultimate Bravery](http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/) with my mates and I was thinking, wouldn't it be fun to have a featured gamemode for it. The way I would have it is with the [original rules](http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/rules.php) but also with some other features to remove cheating/unfair play such as:

- Having a randomly assigned champion (just like ARAM)
 - Maybe a banning phase although it is random so it's not necessary
- Having random summoner spells
- Having a forced item set (like recommended items) with random items
 - Each item must be complete before the next item is available for purchase
 - No sell button
 - Keep the undo button in case a different build path is preferred for that specific item (no undo once the item is complete)
- Being forced to max certain abilities in a specific order (like Azir's W at the beginning of a match but until it is leveled all the way)
- Assigning random masteries if possible otherwise remove this rule 

If anyone has anymore suggestions, please leave them in the comments below, thanks.
- Shashe

replies.body: This would actually lead to very interesting and fun games. I would like this as a game mode to be honest.
